Package co.edu.unbosque.controller

Class DBConnection

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.controller.DBConnection
public class DBConnection extends Object
The DBConnection class handles database connections. It provides methods to initialize a connection, close database resources, and getters/setters for database connection parameters.
Author:
Juan Pablo Urrego, Javier Meza Montero, Juan Esteban Quintero, Joann Alejandro Zamudio, Jeisson Nicolas Uyaban
